entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Digby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 12:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

Humidity: 99 %

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of thundershowers. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
